title: The Wise Serpent Charmer
hook: In the vibrant Great Fora jungle, Washa the wise serpent charmer never failed to impress with his skills. But one day, an unexpected challenge approached him...
moral: Kindness and patience can overcome even the most difficult situations.
paragraphs: Washa sat by the river, playing his flute to calm the restless serpents of the jungle. Suddenly, he heard a loud hissing noise.
"What's wrong?" Washa asked, noticing a large serpent with a thorn stuck in its tail. "Please help me, Washa. It hurts," the serpent whimpered.
Without hesitation, Washa carefully removed the thorn, soothing the serpent's pain. "Thank you, Washa. I misjudged you," the serpent said, surprised by Washa's kindness.
The next day, the serpent returned with more of its kind, seeking Washa's help. "We are sorry for scaring you before. Will you still help us?"

id-en.hook: In the vibrant Great Fora jungle, Washa the wise serpent charmer never failed to impress with his skills. But one day, an unexpected challenge approached him...
id-en.moral: Kindness and patience can overcome even the most difficult situations.
id-en.title: The Wise Serpent Charmer
paragraphs:
Washa sat next to the river, playing his musical instrument to make the wild snakes happy. All of a sudden, he heard a very loud sound like a snake's breath.
"What's the matter?" Washa wanted to know, seeing a big snake with a sharp thing in its tail. "Please, fix it for me, Washa. It's painful," the snake whined.
Washa helped the snake by taking out a sharp thing stuck in it. The snake felt better and said nice words to Washa for being kind.
The next day, the snake came back with more friends, asking Washa for help. "We are sorry for scaring you. Will you help us?"

en-pt.title: O Encantador Sábio de Cobras
en-pt.moral: Ser gentil e paciente pode resolver até as situações mais difíceis.
en-pt.hook: Na vibrante selva da Grande Fora, o sábio encantador de serpentes Washa nunca deixou de impressionar com suas habilidades. Mas um dia, um desafio inesperado se aproximou dele...
paragraphs:
Washa sentou-se perto do rio, tocando sua flauta para acalmar as serpentes inquietas da floresta. De repente, ele ouviu um barulho alto de sibilo.
"O que aconteceu?" Washa perguntou, ao ver uma grande serpente com um espinho preso no rabo. "Por favor, me ajude, Washa. Está doendo," a serpente soluçou.
Sem pestanejar, Washa cuidadosamente retirou o espinho, acalmando a dor da serpente. "Obrigado, Washa. Eu te julguei mal", disse a serpente, surpresa pela bondade de Washa.
No dia seguinte, a serpente voltou com mais da sua espécie, procurando ajuda de Washa. "Desculpe por te assustar antes. Você ainda vai nos ajudar?"

en-fr.title: Le Sage Enchanteur de Serpents
en-fr.hook: Dans la jungle animée de la Grande Fora, Washa le sage dompteur de serpents ne manquait jamais d'impressionner avec ses compétences. Mais un jour, un défi inattendu s'approcha de lui...
en-fr.moral: La gentillesse et la patience peuvent surmonter même les situations les plus difficiles.
paragraphs:
Washa s'assit près de la rivière, jouant de sa flûte pour calmer les serpents agités de la jungle. Soudain, il entendit un bruit sifflant fort.
"Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas?" Demanda Washa, voyant un grand serpent avec une épine coincée dans sa queue. "S'il te plaît, aide-moi, Washa. Cela fait mal," le serpent gémit.
Sans hésitation, Washa a soigneusement enlevé l'épine, apaisant la douleur du serpent. "Merci, Washa. Je t'ai mal jugé," dit le serpent, surpris par la gentillesse de Washa.
Le lendemain, le serpent est revenu avec d'autres serpents, demandant l'aide de Washa. "Nous sommes désolés de t'avoir fait peur. Est-ce que tu vas toujours nous aider?"

en-de.title: Der kluge Schlangenbeschwörer
en-de.moral: Freundlichkeit und Geduld können selbst die schwierigsten Situationen überwinden.
en-de.hook: In dem lebendigen großen Dschungel von Fora, hat Washa der kluge Schlangenbeschwörer nie aufgehört zu beeindrucken mit seinen Fähigkeiten. Aber eines Tages näherte sich ihm eine unerwartete Herausforderung...
paragraphs:
Washa saß am Fluss und spielte seine Flöte, um die aufgeregten Schlangen des Dschungels zu beruhigen. Plötzlich hörte er ein lautes Zischen.
"Was ist los?" fragte Washa und bemerkte eine große Schlange mit einem Dorn im Schwanz stecken. "Bitte hilf mir, Washa. Es tut weh," schluchzte die Schlange.
Ohne zu zögern entfernte Washa vorsichtig den Dorn und beruhigte damit den Schmerz der Schlange. "Danke, Washa. Ich habe dich falsch eingeschätzt," sagte die Schlange überrascht über Washas Freundlichkeit.
Am nächsten Tag kam die Schlange mit mehr von ihren Freunden zurück, um Washa um Hilfe zu bitten. "Es tut uns leid, dass wir dich vorher erschreckt haben. Wirst du uns trotzdem helfen?"
